name: Black Hat Tales (Alfha 1.6)
description:
This game is being developed as evidence and practice what was learned during the stage of learning the career of technologist in video game development.

Black Hat Tales, It is a 2D RPG game, inspired by the art of Hyper Light Drifter and wanting to transmit an environment similar to the Colombian Andean mountain range,  in general to the aesthetics of the farms and towns of this country.

However, the game is framed in a fictional world created to tell the story of Miguel, a young man who makes his way through a vast hostile and changing world.

File Password: Mishi&Asosiados
